meanings.definition: Latimerias: a type of fish that is part of the Coelacanth family.
meanings.sent1: The latimerias swam gracefully in the deep ocean waters.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study latimerias to learn more about ancient fish species.
meanings.sent3: The latimerias organized a talent show in the coral reef.
meanings.sent4: Her curiosity about latimerias was as deep as the ocean itself.
meanings.sent5: The shimmering scales of the latimerias caught the sunlight, creating a mesmerizing sight.

meanings.definition: Latimerias: plural form of latimeria, referring to more than one fish of the Coelacanth family.
meanings.sent1: Many latimerias were spotted near the underwater caves.
meanings.sent2: Divers were amazed by the beauty of the latimerias swimming together.
meanings.sent3: The latimerias threw a surprise party for their underwater friends.
meanings.sent4: The school of latimerias moved in perfect harmony, like a synchronized dance.
meanings.sent5: The abundance of latimerias in the ocean ecosystem was a testament to their resilience.
